Posts.Content: hi susiemcc. i too found new lump during my radium last month. was diagnoed IDC in march 2014. had chemo first then WLE and lymph nodes removed and DCIS grade 3 was also present  i now have an appt next monday to check this new lump out i  know how your feeling as im too worried. thought i was at the end of it all now!!! feels like im starting again! also told this week that i have cysts on both my ovaries. but i wasnt told this when i had ct scan results which was back in march i had scan. they didnt think i needed the info! so am obviously worried but trying not to be. good luck on fri for your appointment. let us know how you got on xx
Posts.Title: New to the group ...

Posts.Content: hi lucy. me too. your not alone. i was diagnosed in march. 4 rounds chemo. WLE + 5 lymph nodes removed. 15 sessions Radiotherapy. started Tamoxifen 3 months ago.  relieved treatment all finished but am exhausted. constantly tired. tearful. anxious. everyone expects you to just bounce back to the person you were before. i will never be that person again. ! its very hard.  chemo made me go through early menopause. so as well as side effects of Tamoxifen going thru menopause too. not sleeping properly. i was tearful xmas day thinking is this my last xmas. who knows! but am trying to focus on other things fgor next 3 months until i go back for check up.  cry when you need to. i do. music helps me + comedies. you are not alone. take care xxx
Posts.Title: Finding the uncertainty unbearable at times

Posts.Content: I seriously considered the cold cap but when I got to the chemo unit and the nurses there told me if it was them they would not use it as even though there is no guarantee that hair does not fall out with it but they advised me that the chemo will get to all parts of the body including the scalp - as there could be a floating cancer cell lurking there!  Had not thought of it in that respect - so for me I was glad they told me that.  I wanted to make sure I would not have to go through all of this again just to keep my hair! I was diagnosed in March and by end of November I have now had 4 sessions of Chemo, WLE and Lymph node removal and 15 sessions of Radiotherapy. Am now on the Tamoxifen for at least 5 yrs possibly 10  yrs.   My hair is short thick and 50 shades of Grey now!!!  Good Luck with it all. Petrina x
Posts.Title: Hair falling out!

Posts.Content: yes I have.  My last chemo was early July and by early Sept - one by one my nails went yellow and black on bottom of nail, each one came away in their turn.  very painful until it comes off completely. Underneath there was a little nail already growing half way but I had long nails so it was painful for them to come away and come off about 3 or 4 days after it comes loose.   I still have little ridges on the new nails - but my last chemo is now over 6 months ago. Hope this helps. x
Posts.Title: Weird nails

Posts.Content: hi Tonia,  yes appointment booked for next Monday pm. x fingers. xx
Posts.Title: New lump?

Posts.Content: hi Tonia, mine wont be scar tissue. new lump is another part of breast unfortunately :( although its hard to believe it could come back after chemo, radium + am on Tamoxifen since September. will see what they say on Monday. will let  you know. thank you xx
Posts.Title: New lump?

Posts.Content: hi!  i too in same boat. had chemo then op WLE and 5 lymph nodes removed. then radium for 3 weeks. had appt 2 weeks ago with oncologist told him i found a new lump in another part of breast. he too felt it. he said he was referring me back to BC for further investigation. still not had appointment through. quite worried but trying not to be. i thought i was at the end of all my treatment now this hanging like a black cloud again over me!  i hope its not back!
Posts.Title: New lump?

Posts.Content: I've just ended all my treatment but found another lump during my Radiotherapy, had Oncologist check up 2 weeks ago and he also felt it so am now referred back to BC got an appt next Monday. It feels here we go again ! :(  It is really onlo now that it is hitting me with all I been through this year, and the exhaustion is now setting in! I had chemo then lumpectomy WLE and lymph nodes removed then 15 radium treatment and now starting at the beginning again. Am hoping its not come back already! Family never really saw me at my lowest after chemo - always put on a brave face and made sure my bald head was covered either with a scarf or wig.  Didn't think they could cope with seeing me like that.  Some friends kept away and messaged saying they couldn't come to see me as they couldn't cope!!!You always get others who walk across the street when they see you coming. Some people really can't handle the word Cancer. But we have to and have to be strong and positive to get thru it. xx
Posts.Title: Fed up of cancer being the focus ...

Posts.Content: Hi chloecat  How interesting that you got digital scan copies from the  hospital? Ive only just had my Histology report this week (and my op was back in August!!) - I had been asking for copies of their findings but was told I didn't need them and they didn't give any out!! until other women were telling me yes you should get Histology report copy  - Did they offer you these or did you have to ask?  I would be very interested to get some copies of mine too.  x
Posts.Title: To have the op or try alternative

Posts.Content: hi everyone!  i had a CT scan back in march. from neck down not head! so paranoia about head area not checked ever since! but when i got results they said all they found was a kidney stone + they would leave it if not causing me too much probs. however very recently i been told there are cysts on both my ovaries! i am horrified i wasnt told this back in march too. why didnt they? surely they should have told me all their findings from the ct scan?  i have an appointment tomorrow with BC as i found another lump after radiotherapy in same breast another area. i had WLE + 5 lymph  nodes removed back in the summer. so as well as being worried about new lump & thinking am i starting all over again after going through chemo 1 st then surgery then RT i also have worry about ovarian cysts which im going to demand get looked into.  help!!!!!!!!!!! am i worrying unnecessarily?  also been on Tamoxifen for 3 months now! got really bad side effects this month. v bad hot flushes, painful leg cramps. terrible mood swings. feeling fed up really when i really thought i was coming to end of all my treatment!  family + friends just think i should bounce back up now + be the happy person i used to be. but am also v v tired and exhausted too. not sleeping great either!  got my appointment tomorrow so any feedback today i would be v grateful. x
Posts.Title: HELP! v worried.

Posts.Content: thank you so much for this link!! it is v v helpful. it seems this brand does affect others in same way. so glad to rule this one out!! cant wait to try relonchem. might just ditch this brand before xmas and start other brand sooner as it s really affecting me. thank you so much again. hoping my appointment tomorrow is not the dreaded C back!  xx
Posts.Title: HELP! v worried.

Posts.Content: i had ct scan back in march. from neck down not head! so paranoia abot head area ever since! but when i got results they said all they found was a kidney stone + they would leave it if not causing me too much probs. however very recently told there are cysts on both my ovaries! i am horrified i wasnt told this back in march too. why didnt they? surely they shoukd have told me all their findings from the ct scan?  i have an appointment tomorrow with BC as i found another lump after radiotherapy in same breast another area. i had WLE + 5 lymph  nodes removed back in the summer. so as well as being worried about new lump & thinking am i starting all over again after going through chemo 1 st then surgert then RT i also have worry about ovarian cysts which im going to demand get looked into.  help!!!!!!!!!!! am i worrying unnecessarily?  got my appointment tomorrow so any feedback today i would be v grateful. x
Posts.Title: CT scan

Posts.Content: Hi Katee  I had 7 of these injections into stomach on day 3 - 10 after T part of FEC-T chemo!! It was awful!! I had joint pains everywhere - could barely stand let alone walk.  Crying with pain - I had Co-codamol but was prescribed Tramadol for pain relief.  Ask if you can get Tramadol for the pain. Thankfully I didn't need the further 2 chemos as they had originally planned as they decided to operate sooner.  I did manage to self inject after District Nurse did the first 2  . I so sympathise with you  but as soon as the injections stop the pains amazingly ease.  Stay strong. xx
Posts.Title: Zarzio

Posts.Content: hiya.  thank you for replying. i will ask them about cysts tomorrow and ask to be referred on to check them out.   regards Tamoxifen : I am currently on Wockhardt brand this month and having bad side effects. the other brand ive tried is Actavis was on the box but Relonchem was leaflet so as ive now thrown the tablet blisters not sure which i took!  i didnt realise until last week when i asked pharmacist, he told me sometimes box name and tablets dont match what in box. i told him this Wockhardt bad for me!  got Relonchem to try next hoping they ll be better. he did say that it is unfortunately trial + error as what suits one person won't suit another.  Any advice from others experience would be greatly accepted. thank you xx
Posts.Title: HELP! v worried.

Posts.Content: its funny how everyone you talk to think that once you finish all your treatment that you should just bounce back up + be the person you were before diagnosis! easier said than done. unless they ve been through it they dont know how we feel! im coming to end of my treatment in middle of radiotherapy. it all started for me in Feb this year. so like you i feel 2014 passed me by. i might have to consider counselling myself. how do you go for that? as i too feel scared that it might come back but get positive and low days. feel as though i should be more relieved its nearly coming to end. but its tough plus hormones up and down. glad its normal to feel like this. x
Posts.Title: feeling sad and angry after having had breast cancer

Posts.Content: i might go for that. just talking to someone who understands is helpful isnt it. as i do feel sometimes i m losing the plott and not the me i was. its hard to switch off. will it ever be normal again?   thanks xx
Posts.Title: feeling sad and angry after having had breast cancer

Posts.Content: hi.  what they are planning for you is what ive gone through. i was diagnosed in March age 46. . IDC  tumour size 3 cm. as i was quite fit n healthy i had chemo first only 4 i needed then they operated. i had umpetcomy and 5 lymph nodes removed. prior to chemo i had ct scan and bone scan. all routine tests. started tamoxifen in sept and finished 15 sessions of radiotherapy.  its been a rollercoaster ride. am now v v tired but its natural apparently. not being seen now until march. what i recently found out i have cysts on both my ovaries ( these were found from ct scan but i wasnt told til now!) but i been assured not to worry even though no further tests for those done! i await bracca test results in march. dependent on that i might have a big decision to make.   it will be tough but you can do this. you will have days when you think you can't continue but you will get strength.  chemo for me was the worst.  good luck with it all. before you know it you too will be at the end of it like us. take care and Merry Xmas. xxxx
Posts.Title: Just joined the roller coaster - help !
